subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: Benoit Pouliot scored the fourth goal of the Rangers’ first shootout of the season, and goalie Henrik Lundqvist stopped Mikael Backlund of the Calgary Flames for the Rangers’ win.
snippet: Benoit Pouliot scored the fourth goal of the Rangers’ first shootout of the season, and goalie Henrik Lundqvist stopped Mikael Backlund of the Calgary Flames for the Rangers’ win.
